Package frogger.util

Enum SceneSwitch

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<SceneSwitch>
      • frogger.util.SceneSwitch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<SceneSwitch>
    public enum SceneSwitch
extends java.lang.Enum<SceneSwitch>

    SceneSwitch

    A SceneSwitch is a object which helps switch scenes within Main.getPrimaryStage() and pop up.

    This class is implemented as Enum for singleton.

    Usage: 

        SceneSwitch.INSTANCE.switchToHome();
    Since:
    0.2
    Version:
    0.3
    Author:
    Tianyi GAO
    See Also:
    Main.getPrimaryStage(), GameManager

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant Description
      INSTANCE
      Instance for global view management.
